name: BRUH: The Ogre Tales
description:
Have you ever thought of a homeless ogre roaming the universe for fun? No? So I have something prepared perfectly for you! Go on an adventure, fight deadly opponents, collect items, die, and back again!

BRUH is a difficult roguelike game with high replay value(at least its planned to be :D).

Everything ok, but what makes it this hard?

High health of enemies (depends on difficulty level), random events, some funny effects (like drugs, alcohol etc. ) and much more!

Ok, ok i understood, but why main plot is so stupid?

Why not? Its funny :P.

(Remember that the game is still in a very early stage of development, even when I release early access, there will be many bugs!)
